title: Examining Modern Monetary Theory
description: Author Stephanie Kelton says the nation should reject "myths" about government deficits and spend even more aggressively to bolster the economy.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Author Stephanie Kelton says the nation should reject "myths" about government deficits and spend even more aggressively to bolster the economy.
